metadata.result: The Shed: The Cookbook: Original, Seasonal Recipes for Year-Round Inspiration

task.Question: What was the complete title of the book in which two James Beard Award winners recommended the restaurant where Ali Khan enjoyed a New Mexican staple in his cost-conscious TV show that started in 2015? Write the numbers in plain text if there are some in the title.
task.Final answer: Five Hundred Things To Eat Before It's Too Late: and the Very Best Places to Eat Them

Annotator Metadata.Steps:
1. Searched "Ali Khan New Mexico staple TV show" on Google.
2. Opened "Albuquerque | Cheap Eats" at https://www.cookingchanneltv.com/shows/cheap-eats/episodes/albuquerque.
3. Noted the New Mexico staple and the list of restaurants.
4. Searched "Albuquerque Cheap Eats carne avodava" on Google.
5. Confirmed the restaurant name (Papa Felipe's) from the results.
6. Searched "James Beard Award winners Papa Felipe's" on Google.
7. Opened "Papa Felipe's Mexican Restaurant - Albuquerque, New ..." at https://www.nmgastronome.com/?p=4572.
8. Clicked the link on the book title.
9. Copied the full book title from Amazon.

steps.content: What was the complete title of the book in which two James Beard Award winners recommended the restaurant where Ali Khan enjoyed a New Mexican staple in his cost-conscious TV show that started in 2015? Write the numbers in plain text if there are some in the title.

plan: Identify the TV show hosted by Ali Khan that started in 2015.
Research the New Mexican staple featured in that show.
Find out which restaurant was recommended by two James Beard Award winners in that show.
Look up the complete title of the book that includes this restaurant recommendation.

given_facts: Ali Khan has a cost-conscious TV show that started in 2015.
Two James Beard Award winners recommended a restaurant.
The restaurant serves a New Mexican staple.
facts_to_lookup: The title of the TV show hosted by Ali Khan that started in 2015.
The New Mexican staple featured in Ali Khan's show.
The restaurant recommended by the two James Beard Award winners.
The complete title of the book that includes the restaurant recommendation.
